label: uncl7295
comment: Code specifying a requirement or condition.

values.label: Service provider determined service
values.comment: The service was determined by the service provider.

values.label: Contiguous body area service with different set-up
values.comment: The service on contiguous body area that required different set-up.

values.label: Non-contiguous body areas service
values.comment: The service was conducted on non-contiguous body areas.

values.label: Three hours or more between services
values.comment: Three hours or more between the services.

values.label: Left body part service
values.comment: Service was conducted on the left part of the body.

values.label: Necessary emergency and/or immediate treatment
values.comment: Treatment was necessary as it was an emergency and/or immediately required.

values.label: Not usual medical after-care
values.comment: Post treatment medical care which differs from the usual post treatment medical care.

values.label: Right body part service
values.comment: Service was conducted on the right part of the body.
